name: 3D-CandyLand-Survival
description:
Gummy Snake eats his friends. 

He tries to be alive.

No Goals/No Quests/Have Fun

Controls:

Mouse Click to Move.

G to Pickup

D to Drop

W to Wear

E to Eat

SpaceBar to Use

Up/Down Arrow to Scroll Inventory

Things that you can do:

1. Run Around

2. Turn big and small

3. Watch the Snake eat other bears.
